nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils

Class CustomFieldHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.CustomFieldHelper

  • public final class CustomFieldHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for custom field manipulation
    Author:
    luis

                                                                          CustomFieldsContainer<CF,CFV> to,
                                                                          boolean resetOwner)
        Clones the custom field values of a container and copy them to the other container
        Parameters:
        resetOwner - if true sets the owner as null for each clone otherwise sets the "to container" as the owner.

      • mergeFieldValues

        public <T extends CustomFieldValue> java.util.Collection<T> mergeFieldValues(CustomFieldsContainer<?,T> customFieldContainer,
                                                                    java.util.List<? extends FieldValueVO> pFieldValueVOs,
                                                                    java.util.List<? extends CustomField> allowedFields)
        Returns a new collection with the result of merging the old custom field values and the new custom field values. The resulting field values contains a subset of the allowed fields.
        Parameters:
        customFieldContainer - the entity having the custom fields.
        fieldValueVOs - the new field values.
        allowedFields - the allowed fields that can be modified.

        public <T extends CustomField> java.util.List<T> onlyBasic(java.util.List<T> customFields)
        Returns the basic fields only, that is, strings with control = text box, or integers or enums
